bill_title: Reappointing Mr. Marty Guindon of Pierre, South Dakota, to the Office of Auditor General.

bill_versions.bill_text: A CONCURRENT RESOLUTION, Reappointing Mr. Marty Guindon of Pierre, South Dakota, to the Office of Auditor General. WHEREAS, pursuant to the provisions of § 4-2-2, the auditor general shall be appointed by a concurrent resolution of the State Legislature; and WHEREAS, the Executive Board of the Legislative Research Council has recommended the reappointment of Marty Guindon of Pierre, South Dakota, to continue in that position: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT RESOLVED, by the House of Representatives of the Ninety-Second Legislature of the State of South Dakota, the Senate concurring therein, that Marty Guindon of Pierre, South Dakota, be reappointed to the Office of Auditor General, pursuant to the provisions of § 4-2-2, for the term of eight years from adoption of this concurrent resolution and until a successor is duly appointed and qualified; and BE IT FURTHER RESOLVED, that the secretary of the Senate of the State of South Dakota transmit an enrolled copy of this concurrent resolution to Mr. Guindon, the secretary of state, and the Governor of the State of South Dakota. 100 copies were printed on recycled paper by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.161 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
